resources.string:
How to use floata ?
 
-click on login. 
-after login with your account click on/off. 
-Click on the floating icon. 
-Voila ! now tweet. 



How to logout?
 
-Click on Logout icon 
-that is it !




encountered a bug ? report on playstore or XDA.




Please rate us 5 stars on playstore.

Floata 

The first floating TWEET client. 
inspired by AOSPA 3+ "Halo" & Facebook ChatHeads. 

Are you a User of Paranoid Android Roms ? Are you a Fan of Facebook ChatHeads ? Are you a heavy socials user who want to use twitter while playing games/checking whatsapp...etc ? 

If the answer is yes,you are in the right place, welcome to floata client. 

 __________ 

 Features : 
 -Compatible with the old gingerbread and the brand new kitkat. 
 -aceess twitter without leaving your current app 
 
 -Moderate Ram Consumption 
 -Low size 
 -eye friendly design 
 -simple and user-friendly 

 __________
